Module cyfight
Package fr.cyu.cyfight.event.listener

Interface LevelChangeRequestEventListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Game
    public interface LevelChangeRequestEventListener
extends EventListener
    The LevelChangeRequestEventListener is an interface that must be implemented by objects that want to be informed that a level is changing.
    Author:
    Mika INISAN

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onLevelChangeRequest​(java.lang.Object sender, LevelChangeRequestEventArgs eventArgs)
      Called when a level is changing.

    • Method Detail

      • onLevelChangeRequest

        void onLevelChangeRequest​(java.lang.Object sender,
                          LevelChangeRequestEventArgs eventArgs)
        Called when a level is changing.
        Parameters:
        sender - the object that requested the level change
        eventArgs - information about the level change
